Text.Text: Stronger and more powerful than the regular battleship, but a bit slower in speed.
A huge cannon to protect islands even more.

AI Combat Ship Buff (for AI only), IF YOU SEE THIS SOMETHING IS WRONG as player should never get this! You got an AI LIGHTHOUSE which you CANNOT DO! INCOMPATIBILITY ISSUE (likely "Ruins on Takeover" mod)! Read the MOD DESCRIPTION and follow the step-by-step process explained there to remove the other mod!
